name: Shitty Elephants in Space: Shitty Space Elephants
name_original: Shitty Elephants in Space: Shitty Space Elephants
description:
Winner of "Best Art" at the 2017 San Diego Game Jam

You are the last female elephaint of your kind! On an epic quest to pollinate the universe with your goobious essence.  Fly around space with your flatulent powers and eat tasty as hell pop tarts.... just PLEASE!!! don't freeze to death.

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move around.

Spacebar to fart.

Win Condition:

Visit 5 planets and Earth

(This prototype/ unfinished game was made in 48 hours at the 2017 San Diego Game Jam)
